traer.physics
Class Spring

java.lang.Object
  traer.physics.AbstractForce
      traer.physics.TargettedForce
          traer.physics.TwoBodyForce
              traer.physics.Spring
All Implemented Interfaces:
Force
public class Spring
extends TwoBodyForce

This class implements TwoBodyForce to represent a Spring with a spring constant, damping factor, and ideal length.

Author:
Jeffrey Traer Bernstein, Carl Pearson
